item.title: Join Jane's Walk for free guided tours around Singapore from May 1 to 3
item.description:
Source: Jane’s Walk website. Gather your coworkers and spend the first weekend of May discovering Singapore with Jane’s Walk, a worldwide initiative of free walking tours led by locals and inspired by Jane Jacobs. The walks encourage people to share their community stories, explore their cities, and connect with their neighbors. “Jane Jacobs, an advocate for walkability, vibrant communities, and citizen involvement in urban development, would be proud! She believed understanding a city requires observation, inquiry, and exploration, and we’re excited to do just that during the weekend of May 1-3,” stated Mai Tatoy, Jane’s Walk City Organizer in Singapore...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/join-jane-s-walk-for-free-guided-tours-around-singapore-from-may-1-to-3/
